channel.title: Adding more than one file to jar?
channel.description:
I can make a jar file but only 1, I can't seem to figure out how to compile more than one lol ....
i do:
[code] jar -cvfm ClientName.jar manifest.txt MainClass.class[/code]
Or do I have to type out every single file name?
ex:
[code] jar -cvfm ClientName.jar manifest.txt EGUI.class client.cass etc...[/code]
?? I don't want to do that...[br][br][size=1]Posted on: October 16, 2009, 03:41:17 pm[/size][hr][b]Nvm i figured it out[/b]

item.title: Adding more than one file to jar?
